segments.text: This kitchen is a complete mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, the kids are being sneaky, and the mom is oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a lack of awareness and responsibility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should be paying attention to what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being naughty, and no one is stopping them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing such disorder and no one doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets and the floor if it keeps overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just take control of the situation and fix it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such a simple problem causing so much chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope someone notices what's happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
